document_data.title: Heroes' Feast: Saving the Children's Menu
document_data.author: [[Deborah Ann Woll]], [[Jason Tondro]], [[Kate Welch]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Heroes' Feast: Saving the Children's Menu''''' is an adventure module using the 5{{th}}-edition {{Dnd}} ruleset released by [[Wizards of the Coast]] on the D&D Beyond website on November 22, 2023. It is intended as a companion to ''[[Heroes' Feast Flavors of the Multiverse: An Official D&D Cookbook]]'' and is set in the ''[[Forgotten Realms]]'' in [[Daggerford]] and the [[Delimbiyr Vale]]. It also includes a recipe for macaroni and cheese.
